g.text: Sends Aadhar Number of doctor along with access token
Sends back "TxnID" along with Mobile Number
An OTP is sent to doctor for Aadhar Verification
Sends TxnID along with OTP and other information for verification
Sends another OTP generation request to verify the mobile number of the doctor
An OTP is sent to the doctor for Mobile Number Verification
Sends txnID and OTP for verification
Sends a request to generate HPR ID
A token along with HPR ID is generated
Sends all the data to the server
Sends back acknowledgement along with pending verification status
